description.en_US: Throw a heavy spike ball that pierces enemies and bounces off walls.
Throw out a volley of shards that home in on an enemy. More accurate at long range.
A powerful shot that explodes on contact, doing collateral damage.
Throw three handfuls of powerful knives. More accurate at close range.
A fast controllable dash able to hit multiple enemies.
A very powerful attack that will hit exactly one enemy.
description.de_DE: Ein sehr starker Angriff, der genau einen Gegner trifft.

description.en_US: A controllable dash through the shadows. Enemies on your path will be struck with a delayed strike.
Dash to a target, hit them into the sky, then jump up and do a falling spin attack.
Passively shoots out projectiles randomly in all directions.
Surrounds you with a spinning blade that damages enemies that get too close. Increase of \c[3]+30%\c[0] Defense while active.
Places temporary static and orbiting shields to block weak projectiles. Also increases your defense by \c[3]+50%\c[0] while active.
Perfect guard an attack and counter with a laser barrage fired from orbit.
A powerful spinning strike that can hit multiple targets in an area.
Take a gamble and roll a number from 1 to 9 for different attack results.
A massive swing that sends all enemies in front of you flying.
Fling out bits of shrapnel from your sword that damage enemies.
Performs a fierce whirl attack, engulfing your enemies in flames.
description.de_DE: Eine glhende Wirbelattacke, die deine Gegner in Flammen hllt.

description.en_US: A blazing thrust of fire piercing through enemies in front of you.
description.de_DE: Ein Feuersto, der deine Feinde vor dir durchbohrt.

description.en_US: Attack with a powerful flail that does heavy damage to all enemies it hits. The tip does more damage than the chain.
Hit a single enemy and follow up with an arc of piercing beams.
A quick melee attack followed by a devastating, controllable spin attack that throws exploding knives everywhere.
A surgical strike against a single close enemy. If hit, follow up with powerful meteors and fireballs.
A barrage of fiery daggers that stick into their target and deal damage over time.
Throw a devastating spear forged from pure solar fragments. Sticks in enemies and deals damage over time.
Perfect guard an attack and counter with a powerful sword strike.
Sacrifice \c[1]-25%\c[0] of your HP and increase your ATK by \c[2]+15%\c[0] for a moderate period. Can be stacked at your own risk.
Perfect guard an attack and counter with flamethrower blasts from three angles.
Draw in enemies and then engulf them in lingering fires.
An apocalyptic cacophony of beams, fire, lasers, and explosions that hits everything in the area.
Summon a sword of holy flames that will supercharge your melee attacks for a short period.
A rapid spinning dash attack that hits all enemies along the way.
Churn up a lingering fire tornado before dashing away.
Dash forward along with a handful of mirages and perform firey slashes. Mirages will explode if they hit an enemy for greater damage.
A frantic, controllable dash the ends in a spin attack. Leaves a trail of flame pillars that block projectiles and damage enemies.
Hit an enemy into the air to be blasted by a powerful heatwave, also catching surrounding enemies in the blast.
Blast enemies with a spontaneous eruption of ice chunks before slashing them away.
Two wide icy sword slashes that can hit multiple enemies in front of you.
Hit a single enemy with a short-range combo to knock them into a powerful icicle rupture.
Perform a large swirling area attack that spawns a ring of frozen stars.
Draw in enemies before lunging forward, striking a single enemy with a powerful icicle rupture and avalanche.
Engulf enemies in a swirling hurricane before finishing with a powerful slash. Can also hit flying enemies.
Lunge through enemies with an icy blade, leaving behind a trail of frozen stars.
Perform a fast dash that attacks one enemy and freezes them solid.
Shoot a flurry of snowballs emitting from a stationary point.
Throw snowflakes that explode into multiple hailstones aimed at nearby enemies.
Shoot out a controllable stream of freezing wind from your sword.
Throws a powerful snowflake bomb that showers an area in icy hail before exploding on contact.
Swing your sword to shoot three powerful frost rays that pierce all enemies.
Slash enemies away and spawn several icicles in front of you, blocking projectiles and damaging enemies on contact.
description.de_DE: Stoe Gegner weg und verbarrikadiere dich hinter Eiskristallen, die Projektile blocken und Gegner bei Kontakt verwunden.

description.en_US: Instantly encase yourself in ice, negating huge amounts of damage for a short time.
A barrage of icicles and hailstones are unleased in a flurry of slashes over a wide area.
Quickly encase yourself in ice for longer, negating even more damage and healing \c[2]+25%\c[0] of your maximum HP while frozen.
Summon a field of powerful icicles to impale enemies in the area.
Construct a towering ice platform and freeze yourself to heal \c[2]+40%\c[0] of your HP and cure status effects while effects out of enemy reach.
A wide swing with a special sword that releases a swarm of electric bees.
Strike an enemy with a quick thrust. If hit, three shadow sparks will surround and attack the enemy after some time.
Summon two clones in a triangular formation to perform spinning attacks before you re-merge and perform a powerful finisher.
Hit an enemy to summon a lightning strike in front of you, dealing heavy damage to anything caught in the blast.
Call fourth your inner courage to trap an enemy and follow up with a flurry of slashes.
Throw two very fast, accurate, and piercing lightning bolts.
Throw out magnetic prisms that will zap the enemy you proceed to mark with a projectile.
Throw three straight bolts that pierce enemies and deal lingering damage.
Throw a slow-moving shock ball that zaps nearby enemies as it travels.
Throw two large, rotating lightning storms that draw in enemies and deal heavy damage as they travel, striking all in their path.
Throw an unstable magnetic cluster that unleashes a devastating attack when it hits an enemy.
Hit a single enemy with a flurry of rapid strikes before sending them flying with a powerful slash.
Use an electricity barrier to charge through multiple enemies.
Hit a single enemy to perform a quick flurry of phantom strikes.
Dash along a jagged path, leaving behind a trail of lightning strikes.
Dash into a single enemy to mark them for a homing laser attack.
Dash and leave a devastating lightning storm along your path.
Experience time at a faster rate for a brief period. Slightly reduces ATK, FOC stats while active.
Block one attack and stop time for everything but yourself.
description.de_DE: Blocke einen Angriff und stoppe die Zeit fr alle auer dich selbst.

description.en_US: A quick and explosive spin attack that knocks enemies back.
Lunge forward and blast an enemy with a wave vortex, before swinging them away.
Throw an unwieldy yet powerful arc of three small wave bombs at a fixed range.
Hit an enemy with a curse that absorbs HP over time.
Throw a bouncing orb that follows enemies and explodes when it lands.
Throw a projectile that will create a lingering zone that absorbs HP from all enemies within.
Throw an orb that summons seeking bombs upon bouncing off walls.
Summon a line of decoys that shoot rapid-fire projectiles in a row, followed by powerful lasers.
Summons three orbiting wave turrets that shoot nearby enemies.
Block frontal attacks and recover some of the blocked damage for a short time.
Quickly teleport into the air, then crash down with an explosion.
Empower your sword with a healing essence, causing all standard attacks to emit healing projectiles for a time.
Perfect guard an attack and infect your attacker, who violently explodes shortly after.
Place a mine that explodes when enemies move nearby.
Dash away and leave behind a decoy, distracting your foes.
description.de_DE: Dashe dich in Sicherheit und hinterlasse einen Lockvogel, der deine Feinde ablenkt.

description.en_US: The enemy hit by your dash dissolves into scattered wave energy, taking massive damage when it re-forms. Hits enemies with frontal shields.
Dash away and leave behind a decoy that will carry out a basic attack.
Dash into an enemy to target them for a relentless bombardment, during which they will be slowed.
Dash away and leave behind an army of decoys that will use more powerful attacks.
